java/liquibase/database/sql/AddColumnStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 import java.util.Arrays;
00007 import java.util.HashSet;
00008 import java.util.Set;
00009 
00010 public class AddColumnStatement implements SqlStatement {
00011 
00012     private String schemaName;
00013     private String tableName;
00014     private String columnName;
00015     private String columnType;
00016     private Object defaultValue;
00017     private Set<ColumnConstraint> constraints = new HashSet<ColumnConstraint>();
00018 
00019     public AddColumnStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName, String columnType, Object defaultValue, ColumnConstraint... constraints) {
00020         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00021         this.tableName = tableName;
00022         this.columnName = columnName;
00023         this.columnType = columnType;
00024         this.defaultValue = defaultValue;
00025         if (constraints != null) {
00026             this.constraints.addAll(Arrays.asList(constraints));
00027         }
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSchemaName() {
00031         return schemaName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public String getTableName() {
00035         return tableName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getColumnName() {
00039         return columnName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public String getColumnType() {
00043         return columnType;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public Set<ColumnConstraint> getConstraints() {
00047         return constraints;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00051         if (isPrimaryKey() && (database instanceof CacheDatabase
00052                 || database instanceof H2Database
00053                 || database instanceof DB2Database
00054                 || database instanceof DerbyDatabase)) {
00055             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Adding primary key columns is not supported", this, database);
00056         }
00057 
00058         String alterTable = "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ADD "+getColumnName() + " " + database.getColumnType(getColumnType(), isAutoIncrement());
00059 
00060         if (defaultClauseBeforeNotNull(database)) {
00061             alterTable += getDefaultClause(database);
00062         }
00063 
00064         if (primaryKeyBeforeNotNull(database)) {
00065             if (isPrimaryKey()) {
00066                 alterTable += " PRIMARY KEY";
00067             }
00068         }
00069 
00070         if (isAutoIncrement()) {
00071             alterTable += " "+database.getAutoIncrementClause();
00072         }
00073 
00074         if (!isNullable()) {
00075             alterTable += " NOT NULL";
00076         } else {
00077             if (database instanceof SybaseDatabase) {
00078                 alterTable += " NULL";
00079             }
00080         }
00081 
00082         if (!primaryKeyBeforeNotNull(database)) {
00083             if (isPrimaryKey()) {
00084                 alterTable += " PRIMARY KEY";
00085             }
00086         }
00087         
00088         if (!defaultClauseBeforeNotNull(database)) {
00089             alterTable += getDefaultClause(database);
00090         }
00091 
00092         return alterTable;
00093     }
00094 
00095     private boolean primaryKeyBeforeNotNull(Database database) {
00096         return !(database instanceof HsqlDatabase);
00097     }
00098 
00099     private boolean isAutoIncrement() {
00100         for (ColumnConstraint constraint : getConstraints()) {
00101             if (constraint instanceof AutoIncrementConstraint) {
00102                 return true;
00103             }
00104         }
00105         return false;
00106     }
00107 
00108     public boolean isPrimaryKey() {
00109         for (ColumnConstraint constraint : getConstraints()) {
00110             if (constraint instanceof PrimaryKeyConstraint) {
00111                 return true;
00112             }
00113         }
00114         return false;
00115     }
00116 
00117     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00118         return ";";
00119     }
00120 
00121     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00122         return true;
00123     }
00124 
00125     private boolean defaultClauseBeforeNotNull(Database database) {
00126         return database instanceof OracleDatabase
00127                 || database instanceof HsqlDatabase
00128                 || database instanceof DerbyDatabase
00129                 || database instanceof DB2Database
00130                 || database instanceof FirebirdDatabase;
00131     }
00132 
00133     private String getDefaultClause(Database database) {
00134         String clause = "";
00135         if (getDefaultValue() != null) {
00136             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00137                 clause += " CONSTRAINT " + ((MSSQLDatabase) database).generateDefaultConstraintName(tableName, getColumnName());
00138             }
00139             clause += " DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00140         }
00141         return clause;
00142     }
00143 
00144     public boolean isNullable() {
00145         if (isPrimaryKey()) {
00146             return false;
00147         }
00148         for (ColumnConstraint constraint : getConstraints()) {
00149             if (constraint instanceof NotNullConstraint) {
00150                 return false;
00151             }
00152         }
00153         return true;
00154     }
00155 
00156     public Object getDefaultValue() {
00157         return defaultValue;
00158     }
00159 }
